title: Wonders of weather
brief_description: Weather affects everyone everyday. It has won wars, helped topple empires and caused spectacular disasters. Unpredictable, unreliable and downright capricious - this series tries understand the wonder that is weather.
description: Weather affects everyone everyday. It has won wars, helped topple empires and caused spectacular disasters. Unpredictable, unreliable and downright capricious - this series tries understand the wonder that is weather.
